privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn Privacy Policy - How we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR, Swiss nDSG, and US privacy laws.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: At Learn, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our flashcard learning service.
introduction.contact: For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at contact@fx64b.dev

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: Under GDPR Article 6 and Swiss nDSG, we process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

purposes.serviceProvision: Performance of contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) - to provide our learning service and manage your account
purposes.legitimateInterests: Legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR) - for service analytics, fraud prevention, and service improvement
purposes.consent: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) - for marketing communications, non-essential cookies, and AI-powered features
purposes.legal: Legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR) - for tax compliance and regulatory requirements

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and information automatically collected when you use our service.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.email: Email address (required for account creation and authentication)
personalInfo.name: Name or display name (optional, for personalization) [Not implemented as of July 2025]
personalInfo.preferences: Learning preferences and settings (language, difficulty preferences, study goals)
personalInfo.avatar: Profile picture (optional, stored on our servers if uploaded) [Not implemented as of July 2025]

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.studyStats: Learning progress data (cards studied, accuracy rates, study sessions, time spent)
usageData.deckData: Flashcard content you create or import (questions, answers, notes, tags)
usageData.analytics: Usage analytics (pages visited, features used, session duration - collected via Vercel Analytics)
usageData.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information, operating system - collected via Vercel Analytics)
usageData.logs: Server logs (for security, debugging, and service improvement - retained for 90 days maximum)

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use trusted third-party services to provide our functionality. Each service has its own privacy policy and data handling practices.

vercel.title: Hosting and Analytics (Vercel)
vercel.description: Our application is hosted on Vercel. Vercel Analytics collects anonymous usage statistics to help us improve our service. This includes page views, user interactions, and performance metrics. No personal data is shared with Vercel Analytics beyond what's necessary for hosting our service. Data transfers to Vercel (US) are protected by the EU-US Data Privacy Framework adequacy decision.

stripe.title: Payment Processing (Stripe)
stripe.description: For paid subscriptions, we use Stripe for secure payment processing. Stripe collects and processes payment information according to their privacy policy and PCI DSS standards. We do not store complete payment information on our servers - only payment status and subscription metadata. Data transfers to Stripe (US) are protected by Standard Contractual Clauses and additional safeguards.

ai.title: AI Services (Google AI)
ai.description: When you use AI-powered flashcard generation features, your flashcard content (questions, answers, and context) is processed by Google's AI services (Gemini). This data is transmitted securely and used solely to generate flashcard content. Google may temporarily process this data. We recommend not including sensitive personal information in content sent to AI services.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.description: We use your information for the following purposes, based on the legal grounds outlined above:
dataUse.serviceProvision: To provide, maintain, and improve our learning service and user experience
dataUse.improvement: To analyze usage patterns and improve our algorithms and features
dataUse.communication: To communicate with you about your account, service updates, and respond to support requests
dataUse.legal: To comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, and ensure service security
dataUse.marketing: To send promotional materials and product updates (only with your explicit consent, easily withdrawable)

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Some of our service providers are located outside the EU/EEA. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:
internationalTransfers.safeguards: Data transfers to the US are protected by: (1) EU-US Data Privacy Framework adequacy decision for Vercel, (2) Standard Contractual Clauses with Google AI and Stripe, (3) Additional technical and organizational safeguards including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, and regular security assessments

userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
userRights.description: Under GDPR, Swiss nDSG, and applicable US state privacy laws, you have the following rights:
userRights.access: Access: Request access to your personal data and information about how it's processed
userRights.rectification: Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data
userRights.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal retention requirements)
userRights.portability: Data Portability: Export your flashcard data in a structured, machine-readable format
userRights.objection: Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests or for direct marketing
userRights.restriction: Restriction: Request restriction of processing under certain circumstances
userRights.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for processing based on consent (without affecting lawfulness of past processing)

rightsImplementation.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
rightsImplementation.process: Submit requests via email to contact@fx64b.dev or through your account settings
rightsImplementation.timeframe: We respond within 30 days for EU/Swiss users, or 45 days for US users (with possible 30-day extension for complex requests)
rightsImplementation.verification: Identity verification may be required for sensitive requests to protect your privacy
rightsImplementation.appeals: You have the right to appeal any denials within 30 days of our response
rightsImplementation.authority: You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority if you believe your rights have been violated

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy Protection
childrensPrivacy.description: Our service is not intended for children under 13.
childrensPrivacy.parental: If you believe a child under 13 has provided personal data, please contact us immediately at contact@fx64b.dev

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction:
measures: Encryption in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256)
Regular security assessments and penetration testing
Access controls and employee security training
Secure authentication mechanisms and session management
Regular security updates and vulnerability management
Data backup and disaster recovery procedures
dataSecurity.limitation: However, no internet transmission or storage system is completely secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention Periods
dataRetention.description: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy:

periods.accountData: Account data: Retained while your account is active + 3 years after account deletion (for legal compliance)
periods.studyData: Learning progress and flashcard data: Retained while account is active + 1 year after deletion (for potential account recovery)
periods.paymentData: Payment data: 7 years for tax and regulatory compliance (stored by Stripe, not on our servers)
periods.logs: Server logs and technical data: Maximum 90 days
periods.marketing: Marketing consent and communications: Until consent is withdrawn + 30 days for processing

dataRetention.deletion: You can delete your account at any time, which will initiate the deletion process according to these retention periods

privacyByDesign.title: Privacy by Design Implementation
privacyByDesign.description: We implement Privacy by Design and Privacy by Default principles throughout our service:
measures: Default privacy-protective settings for new accounts (minimal data collection, restricted sharing)
Data minimization in AI processing pipelines (only necessary content is processed)
Pseudonymization of analytics data to prevent direct identification
Regular privacy impact assessments for new features and integrations
Built-in user controls for data sharing and processing preferences
Automatic data deletion and retention management systems

dataProtectionAssessment.title: Data Protection Impact Assessment
dataProtectionAssessment.description: We have conducted Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIA) for our AI-powered features and data processing activities to ensure minimal privacy impact and appropriate safeguards. These assessments are regularly reviewed and updated as our service evolves.

aiProcessing.title: AI and Automated Decision-Making
aiProcessing.description: Our AI features for flashcard generation involve the following processing activities:
processing: Content analysis of your flashcard text for educational relevance and quality improvement
Generation of new flashcard content based on your existing materials
No profiling or automated decisions that significantly affect your legal rights or interests
Human oversight and review mechanisms for AI-generated content
Your right to review, edit, and delete all AI-generated outputs before saving
aiProcessing.dataMinimization: Only essential content data (questions, answers, and minimal context) is processed by AI services. No personal identifiers or sensitive data are included in AI processing.
aiProcessing.transparency: You are always informed when AI processing occurs, and you maintain full control over AI-generated content

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies for essential functionality and service improvement:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for authentication, security, and basic functionality. These cannot be disabled without affecting service operation.
essential.types: Session cookies, authentication tokens, security tokens, user preference settings

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: While Vercel Analytics is used, no analytics cookies are stored.
analytics.control: You can control analytics cookies through your browser settings or by opting out of analytics tracking

cookies.control: You can control cookie settings in your browser. Disabling essential cookies may limit service functionality.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or service features. We will notify you of significant changes by:
notification: Posting the updated policy on this page with a new effective date
Sending email notifications for material changes that affect your rights
Providing in-app notifications for changes requiring new consent
Maintaining a changelog of significant updates for transparency
changes.consent: Continued use of our service after changes constitute acceptance of the updated policy, unless new consent is required by law.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about this Privacy Policy, to exercise your rights, or to report privacy concerns, contact us:
contact.response: We aim to respond to all privacy inquiries within 5 business days.

billing.description: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly or yearly basis. Prices are displayed in Swiss Francs (CHF). Pricing is subject to change with 30 days' notice.

refunds.description: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Refunds may be granted at our discretion. Contact support for refund requests within 14 days of payment. Cancelled subscriptions remain active until the end of the current billing period.

disputes.title: Payment Disputes
disputes.description: Payment disputes should be addressed with us first before contacting your payment provider. We will work to resolve billing issues promptly and fairly.
